text: Michael "Mike" Griffiths (born 18 March 1962)Mike Griffiths player profile Scrum.com is a former Welsh rugby union player and British Lion,Mike Griffiths playing career Lionsrugby.com currently coaching Ystrad Rhondda RFC in the Welsh Rugby Union Division 2 East. He plied his trade with Pontypridd RFC between 1997 and 2003, making 73 appearances. Griffiths's father is George Griffiths, a builder, and his mother is Joy Griffiths. He has two sons, Joel Michael and Luc Rhys.
